overview: Sexy moms with beautiful daughters share personal life lessons about being a woman and being with a woman! This unique, taboo-themed lesbian film brings world famous stars together with hot young starlets in four all-girl threeways. The hardcore adventures include a first-time cosplay experience that gets physical, a powerful women-in-history museum visit, a hot tennis match with sexy cool-down, and a mother's how-to lesson for being an "internet breaking" tabloid tart. Daughters, moms, sisters and aunts all come closer wit h extra special bonding in Lesbian Family Affair 3! Directed by Tanya Tate.
title: Lesbian Family Affair 3
